name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
setup: Lie back with dumbbells above chest
steps: Inhale and slowly lower weights in wide arc
Keep slight bend in elbows throughout
Lower until you feel stretch in upper chest
Exhale and bring weights back up in same arc
Squeeze upper chest muscles at top
cues: Arc motion like hugging large barrel
mistakes: Going too heavy and losing arc motion
Lowering too far past shoulder level
Using pressing motion instead of fly
safety: Incline angle reduces shoulder stress vs flat flyes. Use lighter weight than flat bench version.

joints.notes: Incline angle is generally shoulder-friendlier than flat flyes.
